result.title: Press release, leaflets, posters, kakemonos n°1
result.description: D11.4 gathers documents that will be edited at the launch of the project (Task 11.4). - A first press release will be written to communicate about the scope of the project, main objectives, involved partners, etc. Leaflet, posters and kakemonos will be designed to allow each partner to communicate about the project during exhibitions, conferences, meetings, etc. These dissemination tools will present main information about the project (objectives, partners, funding reference, etc.).
